metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22180 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from 13.4. Improper access control allows unauthorized users to access details on analytic pages.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
